components.name: Query Processor

fields.summary: PPD leads to wrong answer when mapper scans the same table with multiple aliases

comments.body: I think in HiveInputFormat#pushProjectionsAndFilters, _pushFilters_ shouldn't be called if there is more than one aliases. Please correct me if I'm wrong.
And the output seems to be correct, because no row has {{c0 = 1}} ?

[~gopalv], yes, I think it's related to ORC PPD.

Your query on "test_txt" returns one row [0, 1], which is the correct answer. However, same query on "test_orc" will return no rows.

Forgot to mention that this issue is only related to the MapReduce execution engine, you need to set hive.execution.engine=mr to reproduce it. [~gopalv] Maybe it's the reason why you can't reproduce it.
Uploaded the first patch. I'm still leaning to add test cases for Hive. If the patch looks fine, I will upload another patch with test cases.
